Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2010 08:57AM Bluedragonfly wrote: Hi,  bob07, PCP often referred one to specialists as they do not have the knowledge of cancer.  I have a PCP who is much the same.  TRY to stay positive until you know for sure.  It is often difficult to face the unknown, but know I care and the others here also.  Keep us posted of your results.
